name: CATWALK
description: Move 1 tile
detailed: Moves 1 tile either horizontally or vertically. Has to move unless blocked in all directions.

name: CATRUN
description: Move 2 tiles or less
detailed: Moves 2 tiles or less either horizontally or vertically. Has to move unless blocked in all directions.

name: CATLEAP
description: Move 3 tiles or less
detailed: Moves 3 tiles or less either horizontally or vertically. Has to move unless blocked in all directions.

name: CATMOBILE
description: Move 4 tiles or less
detailed: Moves 4 tiles or less either horizontally or vertically. Has to move unless blocked in all directions.

name: BRISK WALK
description: Move 2 tiles or less and take priority for the next action only.
detailed: Moves 2 tiles or less either horizontally or vertically. Has to move unless blocked in all directions. Player goes first during the next set of actions only.

name: QUICKSTEP
description: Move 1 tile. This card can be inserted and played as a 4th action any time at any action order.
detailed: Moves 1 tile either horizontally or vertically. Has to move unless blocked in all directions. This card can be played instantly as a 4th action at any time or at any action order.

name: HOT FURBALL
description: Hit the first target player in a horizontal, vertical, diagonal direction from you.

name: STATIC BOLT
description: Deal 3 dmg to all players in a diagonal line one direction from you.

name: KATRATE
description: Deal 4 dmg to all players in a 1 tile radius around you.

name: THUMBTACKS
description: Deal 1 dmg per tile moved, to all players including yourself after this action is revealed.

name: CATACLYSM
description: On Action 3 of next turn, deal 3 dmg to all enemies that are not within a 4 tile radius of you.

name: CATLING GUN
description: Shoot in all horizontal and vertical directions and deal 2 dmg to all enemies in the literal crossfire.

name: CATOMIC BOMB
description: Mark a single tile anywhere on the board. By the end of next turn, deal 3 dmg in a 2 tile radius from the marked tile to All players including yourself.
detailed:
Mark a single tile: a tile on the board will be targeted. Place a marker tile.
End of next turn: card takes effect after the last played card in the next cycle
Radius 2: any players within a 2 tile range will be affected once activated. (count 2 tiles in all directions including diagonally).

name: DEATH STARE
description: Deal 1 dmg to a single enemy in a 4 tile radius around you.

name: THE CLAW
description: Deal 2 dmg to a single target in a horizontal, vertical, diagonal line that is 3 tiles from you.

name: THE DISINTEGRATOR
description: Target a single row or column beside you and deal 3 dmg to all enemies there.

name: CAT JAB
description: Deal 2 dmg to a player in a 2 tile radius around you with 5 lives or more. Otherwise, deal 1 dmg.

name: CAT HAYMAKER
description: Deal 1 dmg multiplied by the action order that you played this card. Hit a single target in a 2 tile radius around you.

name: KATMIKAZE
description: Halve the lives (upper bound) of all players in a 1 tile radius around you including yourself. Skip an action to discard this card

name: STEROIDS
description: Add 2 to your next action.

name: LAZY ROLL
description: Dodge all targeted cards for this action only.

name: TELEPORTATION
description: Can only be played on action 3. Pick any unoccupied tile and transfer there. This does not count as moving.

name: TENTH LIFE
description: If you were supposed to die this turn, donâ€™t. Activated even when unrevealed.

name: CATJUTSU
description: Swap positions with a target player. Does not count as moving.

name: SAIYAN CAT
description: Trigger your next action twice.

name: FEEDING TIME
description: Negate All Move cards after this action is played for this turn only.

name: REFLECTION
description: Reflect all dmg you took this action to the players who played them.

name: NOTHING
description: Do nothing this turn you lazy cat.

name: SCAREDY CAT
description: You are unable to deal dmg or receive dmg for the rest of the turn.

name: GROWL
description: A target player does not play their Action3 this turn.

name: CAT LEASH
description: Move a target player 2 tiles or less.

name: COPYCAT
description: Select an action already played this turn by an enemy, copy that action.

name: SNIPURR
description: In a horizontal or vertical direction, deal dmg to a target enemy leaving them with only 1 life.

name: LULLABY
description: All other players take 1 less action next turn.

name: PLATEMAIL
description: Be immune to dmg for the entire turn.

name: HEAT-SEEKING HEAT
description: Deal 1 dmg to the nearest player to you. Deal dmg to all in a tie.

name: INVESTMENT
description: When this action is revealed, replace it with an action from hand and play it.
